description:
Kuroitsu hopes to acquire pluripotent cells from Camula, Agastia`s strictest executive. But it isn`t until she attends an idol concert on a related matter that she finds her chance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enivré à un festin illusoire, noyé dans le karma qui perd les hommes, le démon voit son âme broyée par les larmes et la colère d’une jeune fille.
Hitobito o Madowasu Gou ni Oboreta, Gensou no Utage ni Yoishireru Oni wa, Otome no Namida to Ikari ni Yotte Mizukara no Tamashii o Kudaku
The Soul of a Demon Drinking into a Stupor at a Banquet of Illusions While Burdened by Sins That Lead All Men Astray Shatters with Anger When the Young Maiden Cries
人々を惑わす業に溺れた, 幻想の宴に酔い痴れる鬼は, 乙女の涙と怒りによって自らの魂を砕く
